poem:
Title: "In Praise of the Unheard"

They till the soil of relevance, 
in fragile echo chambers of dissent.
Undervalued, strained against 
the mainstream's unrelenting current.
In the sterile theatre of charade,
two lone voices dominate the stage.
My heart craves the unfinished chorus,
an orchestration of the ignored.
Ah, the unyielding quietude of neglect, 
yet within, lies the true dialect of respect.
